{{Description|Offer the Dendro Sigils you collect on your adventures to the Tree of Dreams in Vanarana, and obtain the favor of the forest for yourself|System Unlock: Tree of Dreams, Vanarana}}
'''Vanarana's Favor''' is an [[Offering System]] that is leveled with [[Dendro Sigil]]s. It can be found at the [[Tree of Dreams]] in [[Vanarana (Subarea)|Vanarana]], [[Vanarana (Area)|Vanarana]] [[Sumeru]].

Vanarana's Favor is unlocked by completing the quest [[Trees and Dreams]] after the {{Quest|The World of Aranara}}.

Prior to [[Version 3.6]], the maximum level was limited to 20, 30 and 40 in Versions 3.0, 3.1-3.3 and 3.4-3.5 respectively despite the possibility of obtaining more than enough Dendro Sigils. The game prevented players from offering more by displaying the following error: ''"Max level reached for the current version."''

==Tutorial==
;Dendro Sigils and the Tree of Dreams
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Tree of Dreams, Vanarana.png
|text1  = You can obtain Dendro Sigils in your adventures throughout Sumeru. Offer them up to the Tree of Dreams deep within Vanarana to level it up and obtain precious materials.
}}

==Rewards==
Raising the Tree of Dreams' level requires {{Item|Dendro Sigil}} offered in groups of '''35'''. A total of '''1750''' Dendro Sigils are required to reach the maximum level. Reaching the maximum level will grant the {{Achievement|Culmination of the Great Dream}}.

All levels, except levels 40 and 50, will reward: {{Card|Adventure EXP|200|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Mystic Enhancement Ore|10|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Mora|50,000|show_caption=1}}

Level 40 will instead reward: {{Card|Dream Solvent|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Mystic Enhancement Ore|10|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Mora|50,000|show_caption=1}}

Level 50 will instead reward: {{Card|"The Poetry of Song and Dreams"|1|quality=4|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Mystic Enhancement Ore|10|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Mora|50,000|show_caption=1}}

Each respective level will also reward:
